nodes.documentation:
Workflow:
1. User approves Inheritance contract to spend desired amount of tokens
2. User calls Inheritance doIt() function. This function does in one transaction:
a) transfer amount of tokens approved previously to itself
b) approve Sablier contract to spend tokens that are now owned by Inheritance contract
b) calls createStream() on Sablier contract. Sablier contract does:
a) create stream where Inheritance contract is the sender (msg.sender)
b) transfer previously approved tokens from Inheritance contract to itself
Result:
- A new stream for recipient is created, with the Inheritance contract as sender.
- Since the user is not the Sender, he can not cancel the stream anymore.
- No dangerous temporary accounts are involved
nodes.name: Inheritance

Sablier contract does: a) create stream where Inheritance contract is the sender (msg.sender) b) transfer previously approved tokens from Inheritance contract to itself Result: - A new stream for recipient is created, with the Inheritance contract as sender. - Since the user is not the Sender, he can not cancel the stream anymore. - No dangerous temporary accounts are involved
